Class Train

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
train.Train
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class Train extends Thread
Class representing a Train in the concurrent train model.

  • Nested Class Summary

      private final String name

  • Constructor Details

    • Train

      public Train(String name, Position p) throws BadPositionForTrainException
      Constructor for creating a Train with a specified name and position.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the train (cannot be null).
      p - The position of the train within the railway (cannot be null).
      Throws:
      BadPositionForTrainException - If either the name or the position of the train are entered null.

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Method to run the Train thread. Each time the thread is run, the train advances.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable
      Overrides:
      run in class Thread

    • advance

      public void advance()
      Method that makes the train advance. If the train wasn't made to stop (InterruptedException), the train searches the adjacent sections to the section it occupies and chooses the section to advance to depending on the direction that it's facing (left to right or right to left).

    • turnAround

      public void turnAround()
      Method that makes the train turn around (change direction) if it reaches a station.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a description of the train's situation (position)
      Overrides:
      toString in class Thread
      Returns:
      The Place object linked to this arc.
